metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9897 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple denial-of-service attacks that can be triggered by writing to the terminal exist in PuTTY versions before 0.71.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9897` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pterm - 0.67-3+deb9u1build0.16.04.1
putty - 0.67-3+deb9u1build0.16.04.1
putty-tools - 0.67-3+deb9u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: putty package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.67-3+deb9u1build0.16.04.1').
